pr_title: Add client config load before initializing metrics heartbeat

timeline.message: Load conf before initializing metrics heartbeat

timeline.bodyText: Should we only do this if metrics are enabled?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText:
For the safest change, we should only do this if metrics are enabled.
Update client configuration beforehand in all cases may help acquire and work with block worker client and file system master client.
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Change to only do it when client metrics is enabled.
replies.author: LuQQiu
